content: Confluence will be coming down tomorrow Friday the 20th at 7:30 PM EST for maintenance.
Confluence will be coming down in 5 minutes for maintenance.
Confluence is back up. If you have any issues, please let me know!
Good morning, we are tracking that Confluence is slow and are investigating! Thank you for your patience.
@Joshua Procious is got much bigger problems than that now - not working at all
And even the maintenance notice page that asks for my patience is served with an expired certificate. Just wanted to note that. I continue to be patient. :)

Confluence has an expired cert that is reported, today, to be 179 days out. Funny because it was working without complaint a couple of days ago. @Joshua Procious Screen-Shot-2021-09-06-at-12.00.34-PM.png
@Eric Schmitt @Lynn Laakso in case Josh is out of office

Good morning All. I was made of aware of the Confluence Down issue. We have to provide an emergency update due to one of the most severe vulnerabilities that Atlassian has been affected by. Information on it can be found here while we address: https://siliconangle.com/2021/09/05/us-cyber-command-warns-atlassian-confluence-vulnerability-actively-exploited/
Thank you for your patience!
Hello Rob, the certs were the least of the issues but thank you for the ping. It's been resolved and is back up. Please clear cache in browser. If you have any issues, please let me know sir.
Confluence is coming down for an upgrade! Estimated time: 2hrs.
Confluence is back up! If you have any questions, please let me know!
We are currently investigating why Confluence is down. Thank you for your patience.
Confluence is back up. Please clear your browsing cache and attempt to login. If you have any questions, please let me know! Thank you.
Confluence will be coming down shortly with an expected uptime of 10 AM EST.
Expected uptime 10:45 AM EST. Thank you for your patience.
Confluence is coming back online momentarily.
Confluence is back online. If you have any issues, please let us know!
Confluence is Down. We are currently investigating.
Confluence is up. Please let me know if you have any questions.
